attributes.action: Increase penaltys for mobile fone use while driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the penalty for using a hand held mobile phone remains so low many more accidents, injurys and deaths will occur.If the penalty were to be increased to £500 minimum it would encourage drivers to invest in a fully hands-free installation, costing about £150, therefore making worthwhile. Few drivers will pay out for a kit while its cheaper to pay a fine.The treasury would also benefit from the extra vat charged on the hands free kits.I call on the Government to increase the fine and promote hands free installations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
